snippet: For the second time this week, an arbitrator dismissed the union’s challenge of the suspensions stemming from the Saints bounty scandal.
abstract: NFL players union is again denied in its quest to challenge the discipline handed out by commissioner Roger Goodell regarding the New Orleans Saints bounty scandal.
lead_paragraph: For the second time this week, an arbitrator dismissed the union’s challenge of the suspensions stemming from the Saints bounty scandal.

headline.seo: Grievance on Saints Bounty Suspensions Is Denied Again
headline.main: Saints Bounty Grievance Is Denied Again
